channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Layoffs in October hit highest level for month in 22 years as companies cite cost-cutting, AI
item.description: U.S. employers announced 153,074 job cuts in October 2025, marking a 175% increase from the previous year and the highest total for the month of Octob...

item.title: SiTime’s Precision MEMS Timing Technology Boosts Earnings In The AI Era
item.description: The Silicon Valley company, and specialist in micro-electro-mechanical systems (MEMS) timing devices, is riding the same wave that’s lifting NVIDIA, B...

item.title: A New AI-Powered Platform Could Reduce Barriers To Transferring College Credits–And Graduation
item.description: CourseWise aims to streamline the transfer process, which can interfere with degree completion, particularly for those who start at money-saving commu...

item.title: Predictions 2026: CMOs Adapt, Endure, And Push Forward
item.description: Explore Forrester's insights on 2026 predictions for CMOs. Learn how marketing leaders will adapt, focus on resilience, and embrace innovation in unce...

item.title: FAA confirms which 40 markets will have airline traffic cut 10%
item.description: The FAA orders 10% flight reductions at 40 major U.S. airports starting Friday due to air traffic controller shortages during the government shutdown.

item.title: Nancy Pelosi retires from legendary career as Obama hails ‘one of the best speakers the House of Representatives has ever had’
item.description: “I will not be seeking reelection to Congress,” Pelosi said in a video address to voters.

item.title: Jamie Dimon warns blue states’ business exodus could ‘backfire’
item.description: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon gave a cautionary tale to U.S. states driving businesses out, saying "it will backfire" while speaking at the America B...

item.title: United Airlines to offer refunds because of shutdown-caused flight restrictions
item.description: FAA orders schedule reductions at 40 domestic airports starting Friday due to the government shutdown, prompting United Airlines to offer customer ref...

item.title: Jamie Dimon predicts AI will shorten the workweek: ‘My guess is the developed world be working three-and-a-half days a week’
item.description: He thinks it’ll eliminate jobs, but we can steer our way out of disaster.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani is New York’s first millennial Mayor—experts share how the young leader’s style will differ from his boomer predecessors
item.description: Higher minimum wage for young workers, remote working and a 4-day workweek could get a spotlight thanks to New York’s first millennial Mayor

item.title: Remitly's 24% Stock Selloff Looks Like Trouble From Trump's Immigration Crackdown
item.description: The fintech remittance company announced earnings yesterday and forecasted much slower growth than what it has achieved over the past year.

item.title: Tests showing Chinese-made buses can be stopped remotely prompt Norwegian pullback
item.description: The company said tests, done in underground mines to block signals, used both new Yutong buses and three-year-old models from Dutch maker VDL.

item.title: Boeing won’t face a criminal conspiracy charge over two 737 Max jetliner crashes that killed 346 people
item.description: As part of a deal to drop the charge, the American aerospace company has agreed to pay or invest an additional $1.1 billion in fines.

item.title: Does ‘Predator: Badlands’ Have A Post-Credits Scene? Here’s What You Need To Know
item.description: Everything you need to know about the Predator Badlands post-credits scene, without spoilers.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
